item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m an amateur photographer who mostly enjoys shooting intimate landscape and woodland scenes. My favourite professional photographers are Thomas Heaton, Simon Baxter, Adam Gibbs, Nigel Danson, Ben Horne, and Andrew Baruffi. E-mail: nejc dot ilenic at gmail dot com

item.title: Isolation
